title: Sync tries to get same unknown ancestor roots at the same time
body:
**Describe the bug**
Sync seems to receive same unknown ancestor root at the same time and it blindly asks peers for that same block.
```
2020-10-23 11:03:33 [NETWORK]       ^[[36mverbose^[[39m: peer disconnected 16Uiu2HAkwhANLdLXRbti5L67SyNTCQEiM47bL4eUJR53wZ64Wdef
  7621 2020-10-23 11:03:33 [CHAIN]         ^[[36mverbose^[[39m: Clock slot slot=573317
  7622 2020-10-23 11:03:33 [CHAIN]           ^[[34mdebug^[[39m: Block pools:  pendingBlocks=46, currentSlot=573317
  7623 2020-10-23 11:03:33 [NETWORK]          ^[[33mwarn^[[39m: failed to send request 2320c2f083aaeebb to peer 16Uiu2HAkv6NPdDiqf7B2Q5YK3Y7wvyfd59MYsGuYNXsaifwfrfj9 method=beacon_b       locks_by_root, reason=Failed to dial peer 16Uiu2HAkv6NPdDiqf7B2Q5YK3Y7wvyfd59MYsGuYNXsaifwfrfj9 (response timeout) protocol: /eth2/beacon_chain/req/beacon_blocks_by_root/1/ss       z_snappy
  7624 2020-10-23 11:03:33 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0xabce2227634279e1e65bfb2d29e62f42b421f8dfef66a0ac65ca27ab8c12f248
  7625 2020-10-23 11:03:33 [NETWORK]          ^[[33mwarn^[[39m: failed to send request 3882831a72b97fd5 to peer 16Uiu2HAmB4PsoQgArTHgwEzWYQ22tNW62kyqPZKy3jhPW3nFBpoY method=beacon_b       locks_by_root, reason=Failed to dial peer 16Uiu2HAmB4PsoQgArTHgwEzWYQ22tNW62kyqPZKy3jhPW3nFBpoY (response timeout) protocol: /eth2/beacon_chain/req/beacon_blocks_by_root/1/ss       z_snappy
  7626 2020-10-23 11:03:33 [NETWORK]       ^[[36mverbose^[[39m: sending beacon_blocks_by_root request to 16Uiu2HAmQFM2VS2vAJrcVkKZbDtHwTauhXmuHLXsX25ECmqCpL15 requestId=11c67fba9fda       1f46, encoding=ssz_snappy
  7627 2020-10-23 11:03:33 [NETWORK]          ^[[33mwarn^[[39m: failed to send request 1487f70ceb5aa1b0 to peer 16Uiu2HAkzxjeoqpDrRBFkGCCe19ZhVav4NfgytkYb43Ta6dQeKqy method=beacon_b       locks_by_root, reason=Failed to dial peer 16Uiu2HAkzxjeoqpDrRBFkGCCe19ZhVav4NfgytkYb43Ta6dQeKqy (response timeout) protocol: /eth2/beacon_chain/req/beacon_blocks_by_root/1/ss       z_snappy
  7628 2020-10-23 11:03:33 [NETWORK]       ^[[36mverbose^[[39m: sending beacon_blocks_by_root request to 16Uiu2HAkvCW2JnkwjVpZKbSsPsbVCcJ4se6EUV3K48iPk6xd4PaU requestId=a3aee29daff8       696d, encoding=ssz_snappy
search hit TOP, continuing at BOTTOM
324504 2020-10-23 13:23:04 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
324505 2020-10-23 13:23:04 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
324506 2020-10-23 13:23:04 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
324507 2020-10-23 13:23:05 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
324508 2020-10-23 13:23:05 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
324509 2020-10-23 13:23:05 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
324510 2020-10-23 13:23:05 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
324511 2020-10-23 13:23:05 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
324512 2020-10-23 13:23:06 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
324513 2020-10-23 13:23:06 [SYNC]            ^[[31merror^[[39m: Failed to get unknown ancestor root 0x33795010e59ee4afa646cb1b4b63d0f774c6f4cc233f9304ffc9da1de2b62b02
```

**Expected behavior**
Sync should know that a process to find a block by root already started so it should ignore subsequent requests of the same root.
